title: The Ringer Recommends (Ep. 141)
description:
Chris Ryan is joined by a carousel of Ringer staffers, who stop by to recommend a piece of content that other people should be watching, reading, or listening to.
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
